file_content.text: [This datapad glows softly and flickers to life when you pick it up.]
I will attempt to head them off, but you must proceed immediately.
Darth Ekkage is in cell block 77-Z. Lord Melicoste has already arrived there. If I survive, I will join you, otherwise you'll be flanked.
It amuses me to me think you'll be happy to see me. Good luck.
Sith, I regret that I am unable to rendezvous. I intercepted a communication from Lord Melicoste--his forces have regrouped and are on their way to your location.
